page.title: 13RECREATION (2) CONTINUED
page.content: it can be nice on land but there might have been a storm at sea and the breakers can be wild. Drownings are infrequent although there is a treacherous coastal current and the sandy beach at Shandwick is very popular There is a Guide and Brownie Pack but the Scouts and Cubs have folded for lack of leaders. The Balintore football team plays very successfully in the Welfare League. The Seaboard Improvements Association is a womens group which meets regularly for social occasions and also acts as a ginger group. The District Council have appointed a Recreation Officer who is responsible for the encouragement of participating in all forms of sport.
